channel.title: wiki on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in wiki on Barefoot Rob

item.title: upgrading my wiki
item.description: 11:03 Saturday 17 September 2016 JST I upgraded the wiki on thunderrabbit.com the other day. Now it’s time to upgrade the one on wiki.robnugen.com Rotate ssh key for login Add the login infos to local ~/.ssh/config Effectively disable remote password by setting it to 200+ random characters Backup data Update wiki Yay! 13:47 Yay, but my extension needed a re-tweak. Plus I need to edit all the >permalink> tags to be >permalink/> closed.

item.title: Added MobileFrontend to my wiki
item.description: 09:37 Monday 28 December 2015 JST Now the gallery of images visible at https://wiki.robnugen.com/wiki/Category:Art uses fewer columns if the browser window is smaller.
